synopsis.text: Luka's and Lumi's shared affection for the charismatic upperclassman, Katsuyuki Tohma, takes a heartbreaking turn when he chooses Luka over her twin sister. As they seek refuge in a cave during a party, a mysterious odor leads to a tragic event, leaving the twins as the only survivors. In the aftermath, Lumi undergoes a drastic transformation, both in personality and in the acquisition of terrifying psychic abilities. As Lumi becomes increasingly fixated on Katsuyuki, she'll let nothing stand in her way, not even her own sister, Luka. Prepare for a chilling tale of sibling rivalry, supernatural powers, and a sinister force that threatens to tear them apart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
